Package edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.connectfour.AI

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AIDebuggingOutput
    Created by Joel on 7/27/2016.
    SinglePlayerAdvanced
    Single Player Advanced difficulty class This level of AI scans the entire board and maintains lists of moves to either block or make.
    SinglePlayerEasy
    Single player easy difficulty class This level of AI only makes random moves
    SinglePlayerNormal
    Single player normal difficulty class This level of AI only checks for 3 in a row of human or AI color and blocks/wins
    TestSinglePlayerAdvanced
    Test class for the Advanced AI Notes: (1)Make sure you FULLY understand the way the AI chooses its moves (1.a)To summarize, the AI will; Choose a winning move, else block the opponent's winning move, else, make a triple, else block a triple of the opponent, else, make a random move.
    TestSinglePlayerEasy
    Test class for the easy difficulty AI tests only ensure that the random moves generated are valid
    TestSinglePlayerNormal
    Test class for the normal difficulty AI
